definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: It is excellent to carve as it hardly splinters at all.
sentences.chinese: 對於雕刻件它是極好的，因爲它幾乎不碎裂。

sentences.english: This is a superb concept. It should certainly be done.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種極好的概念，當然應該實施。
今天我們的球隊發揮得極好。

sentences.english: She had a wonderful opportunity, but she muffed it.
sentences.chinese: 新發明具有極好的未來。

sentences.english: Production data is also an excellent source for parallel testing.
sentences.chinese: 生產數據也是並行測試的一個極好來源。

sentences.english: Excellent repeatability thanks to its dyn AMIc probing system with constant measuring force.
sentences.chinese: 由動態探測系統和恆定的測量力決定了極好的重複性。

sentences.english: The Macau Museum, which opened two years ago, offers an excellent introduction to the peninsula's5 past and present.
sentences.chinese: 兩年前開放的澳門博物館極好地展示了半島的和現在。

sentences.english: The Kid's DOZER is a superb preference for kids.
sentences.chinese: 孩子的推土機是一個極好偏愛的孩子。

sentences.english: An excellent medium pale sstaw colour with lemon green tints .
sentences.chinese: 酒色帶有一種極好的中度亮黃色帶有檸檬綠的光暈。

sentences.english: Everybody admires him for his fine sense of humour.
sentences.chinese: 人人羨慕他那極好的幽默感。

sentences.english: An excellent survey of Crace's work to date.
sentences.chinese: 一個極好的克雷斯作品調查已確定日期。

sentences.english: Disney world is a wonderful theme park.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼世界是個極好的主題樂園。

sentences.english: Chrome steel balls have an excellent surface quality and high load bearing.
sentences.chinese: 鉻鋼球有一個極好的表面質量和高承載。

sentences.english: Willow has good resistance and is especially suitable for landscaping.
sentences.chinese: 柳樹的抗性極好，特別適合用於園林綠化。

sentences.english: Here are 10 of the niftiest fever-busting strategies for the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有10個極好的在工作場所擊退發燒的策略。

sentences.english: The model plant Arabidopisis thaliana is an excellent tool for the investigation of the molecular basis of disease resistance.
sentences.chinese: 模式植物擬南芥是研究植物抗病分子基礎的極好工具。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
